title: Day 042 (Exodus 36-38) - Year 3

description:

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: - Romans 2:4

- Hebrews 9:1-10:18

- Article: The Tabernacle, the Creation, and the Ideal of an Orderly World*

*NOTE: Resource not mentioned in TBR podcast
